00033 inline size_t sgi_hash(const char *s) {
00034   register size_t ret = 0;
00035 
00036   for (; *s; ++s)
00037     ret = ret * 5 + (unsigned)*s;
00038 
00039   return ret;
00040 }
00041 
00042 inline size_t sgi_hash(const void *data, size_t len, size_t seed) {
00043   register size_t ret = seed;
00044   register const uint8_t *dp = (uint8_t *)data, *end = dp + len;
00045 
00046   for (; dp < end; ++dp)
00047     ret = ret * 5 + *dp;
00048 
00049   return ret;
00050 }

00056 inline size_t tr1_hash(const char *s) {
00057   register size_t ret = 0;
00058 
00059   for (; *s; ++s)
00060     ret = ret * 131 + (unsigned)*s;
00061 
00062   return ret;
00063 }

00065 inline size_t tr1_hash(const void *data, size_t len, size_t seed) {
00066   register size_t ret = seed;
00067   register const uint8_t *dp = (uint8_t *)data, *end = dp + len;
00068 
00069   for (; dp < end; ++dp)
00070     ret = ret * 131 + *dp;
00071 
00072   return ret;
00073 }

00075 struct SgiHash {
00076   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len, size_t seed) const {
00077     return sgi_hash(start, len, seed);
00078   }
00079 
00080   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len) const {
00081     return sgi_hash(start, len, 0);
00082   }
00083 
00084   size_t operator()(const String& s) const {
00085     return sgi_hash(s.c_str(), s.length(), 0);
00086   }
00087 
00088   size_t operator()(const char *s) const { return sgi_hash(s); }
00089 };
